```{r}
set.seed(1234)

train_mix <- SMOTE(target ~ .-id, train, perc.over = 100, perc.under=200)
table(train_mix$target)

n<-table(train$target)[1]/table(train$target)[2]
train_weigth <- train %>% mutate(weight = if_else(target==1,n,1))
train_weight %>% group_by(target) %>% summarise(n=sum(weight))

df<- train %>% filter(target==0)
n_1<-table(train$target)[2]
sampling<-sample(df$id,n_1,replace = F)
```
